primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God interrupts human vulnerability and exhaustion through His Spirit to birth a new reality (Jesus) that saves and accompanies humanity.

tekstueel_bewijs: God’s spirit stirred and caused something deeply new
the healing, transforming, creating wind of God has caused a new baby
God has come to be with us
a new world, a new heaven and a new earth
save from sin and guilt... death and destruction
make all things new among us
a message from the outside not given in human terms
the angel has spoken the truth
the one who saves us when we cannot any longer save ourselves
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer is primarily the Receiver of the 'dazzling' gift.

helper.identificatie: The Holy Spirit / The Gospel Narrative
tekstueel_bewijs: It is God’s spirit that hovered
Matthew did pretty well for us
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject who acts through the Spirit as the Helper/Power.
helper.rol_van_geest: Indwelling and cosmic power that 'stirs' and 'blows'.

tekstueel_bewijs: when our imagination fails, and our lives shut down in silence and despair
we grow anxious and angry and greedy
death and every kind of danger
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad behavior but the 'exhaustion' of the world and the power of death/despair which requires a divine 'interruption'.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The believer, having been saved, responds to the call of discipleship to live 'differently' (generously/without fear).
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer / Disciple
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The sermon explicitly states that because we are safe (Program 1), we now live differently (Program 2).

voorbeelden_mens_subject: we have signed on for this good news

voorbeelden: not a 'must' in the legal sense, but a 'choice to be made'
be ready to have your sense of the world contradicted
to be a disciple means to know you are safe
he regularly shows up to be with people in need
God’s spirit... created a new community

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on God's 'Power-to-do' (Pouvoir) which creates a new state of being for the hearer, rather than an obligation (Devoir).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (Despair) through ~S1 (Self-management) to S1 (Grace) via the 'interruption' of the Angel.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by the 'gift' which contradicts the 'sense of the world'.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; S2 is described as an 'exhausted world' where 'imagination fails'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon consistently positions God as the initiator and the human as the dazzled recipient. Ethics are framed as a consequence of being 'safe' rather than a condition for it.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God’s spirit stirred and caused something deeply new
the one who saves us when we cannot any longer save ourselves

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures (Apostles, Joseph) are shown as people 'blown' or 'interrupted' by God, not as moral templates to imitate.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: God acts upon Joseph; God blows the Apostles.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from anxiety; movement from greed to generosity.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the 'baby' (soteriology) to the 'adult' (discipleship) is handled as a natural flow of the Spirit's work.
spanning_punten: The call to 'decision' slightly tensions the 'dazzled/passive' reception.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Save from all that kills... death and destruction.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit provides the 'Pouvoir' (Power) that the exhausted world lacks.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is seen as a force that leads to 'despair' and 'abandonment', requiring a 'new creation'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is structurally sound, maintaining God as the Subject of the primary narrative program.

modale_balans.huidige_onbalans: Slightly high on Savoir (Knowing you are safe).
modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain the current focus on Pouvoir (God's power).
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Ensure the 'decision' is framed as a fruit of the Spirit's work.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in maintaining the 'Grammar of Grace' while still calling for a lived response.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the 'dazzle' metaphor; Greimas shows that the 'dazzle' is actually a modal shift from human Devoir to divine Pouvoir.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains Matthew's use of Isaiah; Greimas explains how that quote functions as a 'Sender' of new values into Joseph's closed system.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'trick' Matthew plays with the genealogy is a semiotic subversion of the 'Subject'—shifting from human lineage to divine Spirit.

appendices.notities: The sermon avoids the 'Helper' trap where God is merely an assistant to human effort.
